entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
